pkgmetadata.longdescription: # friendly_stylesPygments compatible styles used with [friendly](https://github.com/friendly-traceback/friendly).Two styles are defined: one suitable for black (or very dark) backgroundand another for white (or very pale) background. These styles are defined in such a way that code highlighted by [Rich](https://github.com/willmcgugan/rich) use consistent colours whetherthe code is highlighted by Rich base on some `repr` bypassing Pygmentsor done by Pygments.![Example of highlighting](example.png)
